metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39698 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
In aio_poll_complete_work of aio.c, there is a possible memory corruptiondue to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-185125206References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39698` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.15.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
